description:
With the vast array of Chaotic Tribes roaming the plains of the Mortal Realms, a few alternative armour designs must be out there from the usual black and silver! So, in today’s video, Dan is painting a scheme inspired by armour on Eternus’ mount to show off what else might be out there, and with only 10 paints! 

Contrast:
Aethermatic Blue 

Base:
Screaming Bell
Zandri Dust

Layer:
Hassut Copper
Pallid Wych Flesh
Runefang Steel

Shade:
Targor Rageshade

Technical:
Nihilakh Oxide

title: How To Paint: Alternative Chaos Warriors | Intermediate | Warhammer Age of Sigmar
